page.title: 04Education (continued)
page.content: Lunch is 12.15p.m. -1.05p.m.Hometime is at 3.15p.m. We have advisory teachers who visit once a month for PE, Art,and Fabric Craft.A spealist teacher for Music comes every Friday morning.The school dentist and doctor comes about once a year. The minister takes school assembly nearly every week and we attend special services held in the village church at Christmas and Easter.Other visitors include the travelling Royal Bank of Scotland van,the school library service and a messenger for T.S.B. We go swimming after the October break until the middle of May on Monday mornings from 9.30a.m.-10.30a.m.The boys from P4-P7 go and play football on Monday afternoons 2.00p.m -3.00p.m. with Dunning school while the girls play netball here.
